r.s: PHP Bindings for the Subversion Revision control system.
r.d: Bindings for the Subversion revision control system, providing a method for manipulating a working copy or repository with PHP.
r.n: - Add svn_lock()/svn_unlock() - Add svn_config_ensure() for setting up a .svn storage directory - Disable password storing unless a password is explicitly set - Allow svn_auth_set_parameter() to unset an option with NULL - svn_blame() returned -1 for a revision number - Fix segfault caused by using an already destroyed pool - Fix segfault when certain data types aren't returned from a commit - Add check on module load that the APR version matches. - Fix fatal error when the location of the HOME enviromental variable can't be read
